# BOSL2 Vendor Slot

This folder exists to satisfy the Codex Hull Lab structure.

Current configuration uses the existing BOSL2 vendor copy at:

- `02_Production_BOSL2/lib/BOSL2/`

The adapter file is:

- `codex_hull_lab/src/gcsc_hull_bosl2_adapter.scad`

If you later vendor BOSL2 into this folder, update the include path in that adapter.
